Text: 8 people thumbed up but no comments? Sheesh...
I'll write a comment after testing the file. I hope it works on my emu, cause I loved this game.

Got everything up and working. And it's all win. Great file. I recommend this. I'll seed as long as I can.  Btw. If you try using the Gameshark codes that come with the psxfin emulator, don't bother with the Infinite Health code. Anytime that code is on you will freeze upon entering the tower, and be unable to load any saved games.
Thanks! appreciate the upload man, will seed :)
